column4: Hi. New to Ubuntu. I can't work out how to make new applications available on the desktop. I've just added IDLE, and it starts just fine from the "New application has just been installed" box but I can't work out what file that's starting -- searching the file system for "idle" doesn't turn up anything that works. Can anyone help?
look for something like "Main menu" under preferences or whateveritscalled
Not sure what it's called in regular ubuntu.
